medium: Etching, aquatint, and drypoint in sienna ink
title: Al toro y al aire darles calle (Make Way for Bulls and Wind), unpublished plate from "Los Proverbios" (The Proverbs)
description: four bulls with legs splaying, seemingly superimposed on top of each other; reddish-brown ink on tan paper; plain dark ground
artist: Francisco Jose de Goya y Lucientes
